titles.title: Making supplemental appropriations for the Department of Housing and Urban Development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1994, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Mr. Durbin asked unanimous consent That it be in order at any time on June 21, 1994, or any day thereafter, any rule of the House to the contrary notwithstanding, to consider in the House the bill H.R. 4568, that the bill be debatable for one hour equally divided and controlled by the chairman and ranking minority member of the Committee on Appropriations; and that the previous question be considered as ordered to final passage without intervening motion except one motion to recommit. Agreed to without objection.
Reported by the Committee on Appropriations. H. Rept. 103-550.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 302.

action.text: DEBATE - Pursuant to the order of the House of Friday, June 17, 1994, the House proceeded with one hour of general debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On passage Passed by the Yeas and Nays: 410 - 9 (Roll No. 259).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

term.name: Department of Housing and Urban Development

bill.summary: 6/13/1994--Introduced. Makes additional FY 1994 appropriations for the following Department of Housing and Urban Development accounts: (1) mutual mortgage insurance program account; (2) general and special risk program account; and (3) guarantees of mortgage-backed securities loan guarantee program account.
